reviewText: Nothing like you see in Bollywood dance, very slow and the moves weren't that great. Regret that I spend my money in this DVD. This DVD is for elderly women that will like to get in shape.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Taught in a concise way. I LOVE the story with the dance somehow the story sets in my head and limbs with this type of instruction. The DVD is fun and there is a gentle, yoga, dance like exercise in the tape. I am impressed.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I had heard of Bollywood films before but I was a newcomer to Bollywood exercise DVDs. I was pleasantly surprised! This is definitely a welcome addition to my exercise DVD collection and I will use it often!
summary: Something new to me in the way of exercise!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I love the instruction for this.  The gestures and traditional folk moves were great.  Although, the cardio/Bhangra part was horrible.  The dancers seemed confused (bless their hearts) and not up to par with her instructing.  They should have rehearsed more or been professional back ups.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Nice intro to Bhangra and the dance routine to Dhoom Tana is very nice.  Would say she needs to work on her presenting to the camera during the Bhangra workout. Great explanations and a fun work out.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Bollywood style helps me capture the rhythm and spirit of the dance and before I know it time has passed and I've worked up a sweat. Low impact,  Thanks Amazon.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was disapointed at the "learning of the movements" and what they represent, rather than the "fun" exercises to the Bollywood sound.
Title: N/A
